However, they can still penetrate the body, reaching deeper tissues, including the brain and internal organs. This deeper penetration means that the energy from these waves is absorbed throughout the body, not just at the surface.

5G, on the other hand, introduces a new class of frequencies known as millimeter waves (mmWaves), which range from 24 GHz to 90 GHz or even higher. These frequencies are much shorter in wavelength and behave more like light than traditional RF radiation.
